Room.Name: North entrance to the catacombs
Room.Description: You are almost surprised to see a tunnel leading off to the south into utter darkness. The floorboards above you haven't been moved in a long time, yet there is life down here. A beam of light from the opening above you falls upon a message scrawled on the wall here. The message reads: Adventure for the strong yet calculating Death for the weak and shallow Treasure for the smart and lucky Death for the stupid and accursed An ancient Glyph above the entrance keeps monsters from wandering up from the catacombs.

Room.Name: North/south tunnel
Room.Description: This part of the catacombs looked roughly hewn and man-made. There is a large cross painted on the floor of the tunnel.To the south it seems maybe a bit lighter for some odd reason. To the north a ray of light comes in from a hole in the ceiling.

ExtraDescription.Description: The cross is a Templar's cross. It seems to have had a fresh coat of paint recently.

Room.Name: Weapon training area
Room.Description: This is a place to keep up on there weapon skills. Much of the equipment looks old and worn but upon further inspection seems quite sturdy in fact.

Room.Name: Prayer training area
Room.Description: The templar's curious mix of religion and fighting is evident here. A central painting depicts a cross composed of swords. The elders teach the ancient art of prayer to the young pages.

Room.Name: Junction of hallways
Room.Description: Training facilities are evident to the west. To the south lies a hallway which has doors every couple of feet, looks like living quarters of some sort. To the east the tunnel leads back into the natural catacombs.

Room.Name: Hallway
Room.Description: The hallway takes on a more indoor look to the west. To the east it looks awfully dark.

Room.Name: Intersection
Room.Description: The tunnel continues to the north and the south, becoming less hewn and more natural to the south. A passageway lined with paneling leads west.

Room.Name: Pages' sleeping quarters
Room.Description: Several bunk beds are lined up across the room. It looks rather spartan and there is little evidence of toys or games. Most of the desks are filled with books and papers of little interest.

Room.Name: Templar Knights sleeping quarters
Room.Description: This is a huge room which is filled wall to wall with beds. Apparently all the low level knights all sleep in this one room. A door on the south wall is labelled "Elders only!".

Room.Name: N/S hallway
Room.Description: The hallway leads north an south. A door leads to a templar's room to the east. The decoration looks rather sparse here.

Room.Name: A Middle-aged templar's room
Room.Description: This is a room furnished in a room becoming a low level templar scribe. No real amenities but better than a communal sleeping quarters. As far as you can tell he would be a rank equivalent to a Sargeant.

Room.Name: Humid, damp tunnel
Room.Description: As the tunnel leads south it gets more humid and damp. Moss covers the walls and ferns even grow in the cracks here and there. To the north it seems much more sterile.

Room.Name: Administration room
Room.Description: The elders gather here to discuss training strategies and count their loot. You notice papers which look like important secret documents lying around. An escape passage leads west.

ExtraDescription.Description: It seems that the loot comes from raids on the towns in the surrounding areas above ground. From the documents it seems that the pages and trainees are kidnapped from the villages too!

Room.Name: N/S hallway
Room.Description: The hallway continues to become more important-looking as you wander south. A room to the east looks rather more pleasant that some of the others.

Room.Name: Mid-level leader's room
Room.Description: A rather nice looking room considering the drab conditions down here. Through all the signs of decoration you can still see evidence of water leaks.

Room.Name: Mess hall
Room.Description: The a huge table with an immaculate white table cloth stretches way off to the south. The room is kept immaculately clean by the nights themselves. They truly belive that cleanliness is next to godliness.

Room.Name: N/S hallway
Room.Description: The hallway continues north and south. A peculiar kind of glow seems to come from somewhere further along the hallway to the south. The room to the east looks like the lap of luxury.

Room.Name: High officer's room
Room.Description: First thing you notice in this room is the pleasant aroma of cedar. All the paneling in the room is made of fine cedar. A painting of an elegant knight hangs on the wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: Something oddly familiar about the knight. He carries a glowing sword with a silvery blade.

Room.Name: Mossy intersection
Room.Description: There is a turn off to the passage here. The main passage leads north and south. To the south it seems to get impossibly darker. To the east you hear... birds? A small rivulet of water seeps in from the passage east. The air is very humid and damp here.

Room.Name: The holy grove
Room.Description: A small grove of birches grow seem to grow from solid rock. You hear birds singing but try as you might you cant see any. A strange glow emanates from a place somewhere to the southeast in the grove.

Room.Name: The holy grove
Room.Description: The trees seem real enough even though they take root in solid rock. You hear other small animals scampering through the light undergrowth yet you see nothing. The grove continues south, east and west. An out of place passage way for some reason heads north.

Room.Name: The holy grove
Room.Description: The grove continues west and south. The glow is roughly to the south somewhere.

Room.Name: Mess hall
Room.Description: "mess" isn't exactly the best word to describe this room. On the contrary, it is immaculately clean. A very long table stretches way off to the north. A hallway is to the east.

Room.Name: End of a hallway
Room.Description: You hear voices coming from a room to the west. the hallway goes north. To the east lies a room which seems to glow with power and piety.

Room.Name: Grand Templar's room
Room.Description: All the items in this room look ancient yet strangely very powerful and rich. There is an aura of great holiness about the room.

Room.Name: Very dark passage
Room.Description: This room is so dark that even powerful magic lights seems to barely illuminate the ground in front of you. If its possible it seems even darker to the south. The passage also leads back north.

Room.Name: The holy grove
Room.Description: The grove continues north and east. To the east a strange humming can barely be heard.

Room.Name: The holy grove
Room.Description: All of a sudden all the mysterious sounds of the grove stop. Or perhaps its just the strange humming and glowing from a clearing to the south drowning out everything else. There is a sort of magical forcefield door to the south.

Exit.Description: a glowing forcefield with a small circular hole in it.

Room.Name: Very dark caveway
Room.Description: This room is so very dark that no one is quite sure whats in it, so there's nothing really to describe except maybe the powerful sense of evil coming from the east and the almost overcoming urge to run to the west.

Room.Name: Deep within the catacombs
Room.Description: It stinks like a lair in here. A rotten smell of humanoid flesh lingers. You stumble over what you think are corpses in the utter darkness. You sense a evil growl from somewhere in the room. maybe everywhere in the room. . ..

Room.Name: Very dark cavern
Room.Description: The cavern is hard to describe due to the extreme magical darkness. Probing with a light source seems to reveal nothing but more darkness.

Room.Name: The holy place
Room.Description: A glowing stone lies in the center of the clearing. You recognize it as the stone of the Excalibur. The strange humming glowing makes it difficult to see if the Excalibur is there or not. Might want to take a closer look if possible.

Exit.Description: a glowing forcefield with a small circular hole in it.

Room.Name: Misty passageway
Room.Description: Warm mist swirl about you making you feel threatened as well as protected at the same time. The swirling mist makes it tough to tell directions quite clearly, but you seem to be able to go north or south. The mist gets denser to the south.

Room.Name: Intersection of caverns
Room.Description: Caverns head north, south and east from this peculiar spot. Medium sized caverns from the east and the north join to form a huge cavern heading south. The walls of the cavern are made of a bizarre mixture of many shiny crystals.

Room.Name: Entrance to the burial grounds
Room.Description: You have entered what appears to be a burial ground of sorts. The templars buried their dead here. Chills go down your spine as you feel something watching you. You hear the random groan of a ghost, the howl of a wraith, and the dry clanking of bones.

Room.Name: The burial grounds
Room.Description: Random tombs to unknown warriors were lain in rows as far as the eye can see. To your horror many of the graves are empty and desecrated. A gap in the rows of tombs leads south and there are more graves to the east and west.

Room.Name: The burial grounds
Room.Description: It seems as if many of the warriors could not stop fighting even in death. They fight amongst each other and flail at any living being that would wander near.

Room.Name: The burial grounds
Room.Description: Legions of skeletal warriors wander by and battle the enemy even in death. Old battlelines have been forgotten and new ones made. Its a gruesome scene.

Room.Name: New graves
Room.Description: The tombs in this section seem somewhat more recent. Rotting zombie warriors groan and wail with blank stares. You hear sounds of digging off a bit to the south.

Room.Name: Misty cavern
Room.Description: A chilling icy mist swirl about you. The dampness and warmth has become bitter cold. The walls of the cavern are several feet thick with ice here. An icy wind blows from the south.

Room.Name: Misty cavern
Room.Description: The temperature is a pleasant and mild here. This is due to a warm wind blowing in from the east and a chilly breeze blowing in from the west. The updrafts create bizarre icy-steamy mists which dance along the walls.

Room.Name: Mist cavern
Room.Description: A warm wind blows in from the east. The air is still stifling hot in here despite the breeze. The mist seems thick enough to be alive. . .

Room.Name: Waterfall of mist
Room.Description: River of hot mist pour down in a cascade from a hole in the cavern. It falls like water down from the heights like a waterfall and creates beautiful swirls. It causes a hot wind to flow west.

ExtraDescription.Description: The hole is much too high up for you to reach.

Room.Name: Huge multicolored tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel leads north and south. To the south there is an odd twinkling phenomenon.

Room.Name: Desolate ruins
Room.Description: Several mausoleums used to grace the way here but these have been defiled. And most have been torn down and burned by looters. Some still seem to be intact to the south. To the northwest is a seeming field of tombs of soldiers, now a battleground for the undead.

Room.Name: Curators place
Room.Description: The undertaker, the historian and the curator used to be here. Now they too have joined the legions of the undead. From the looks of the place they seem to have starved to death. Rickety stairs head down into a sort of basement.

ExtraDescription.Description: Surprisingly the stairs look sturdy enough.

Room.Name: Fresh graves
Room.Description: Graves of recent casualties lie here. Even the most recent don't seem to have been left undisturbed. You hear sounds of digging in progress further to the south.

Room.Name: Twisty cavern
Room.Description: The way twist this way and that and its all you can do to keep your head from spinning. The air is very cold here and layers of ice on the wall. The sounds of metal on ice echo through the cavern. A side passage leads east and the main passage goes north and south.

Room.Name: Striped tunnel
Room.Description: The walls of the tunnels have many brilliant colors in them from the various veins of crystals running in them. An odd twinkling comes from the east.

Room.Name: Prism cave
Room.Description: The roof of this cave peaks over a hundred feet high making it one of the biggest in the catacombs. Crystals of every color cast prismatic sprays of light everywhere. The light from your lamp causes almost a blinding flare of brilliance as more light is added to the multi-colored twinkling phenomenon that exists here. This is also the lair of the fabled and feared Prism Dragon.

Room.Name: Ruined monument
Room.Description: A monument to a famous king once stood here. Not much is left to even signify that is was here at all. A building of some sort can be entered through a basement to the east. The southern gate of the grounds is to the south.

Room.Name: Basement
Room.Description: Its dark and it smells like. ...BATS down here! All you see is a swirl of the darkness and lots of scratching bats madly flailing around. A set of stairs go up into the building and a broken window leads west.

Room.Name: Fresh graves
Room.Description: The graves here seem very recent. You notice many signs of digging and defilement. There are piles of fresh bodies here awaiting burial. A strange sense of evil magic from the south makes the hairs on the back of your neck to stand on end!

Room.Name: Southern gate
Room.Description: A rusty gate here no longer keeps anyone out or in. You see a lonely E/W passage to the south. A little used trail winds east through a crack in the wall.

Room.Name: Scene of ghastly horror
Room.Description: An army of undead creatures of all types are lined up patiently. Their leader is an evil demonoid necromancer. His plans to use his army of undead to take over the world seem about ready to get underway.

Room.Name: Twisty passage
Room.Description: The passage bends north and east here. To the east your not certain what lies ahead due to all the twists and turns you've made. To the north is seems cold.

Room.Name: Cross of caverns
Room.Description: A little-used cavern enters from the south. A passage twists away to the west. An odd twinkling comes from the cave to the north.

Room.Name: Lonely tunnel
Room.Description: Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here. Its just a feeling you get from this tunnel. The tunnel east and west.

Room.Name: Lonely tunnel
Room.Description: Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here. You see a gate to a burial ground to the north. This lonesome tunnel sighs along west and east.

Room.Name: Bend in the lonely tunnel
Room.Description: Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here. The tunnel bends west and south.

Room.Name: Lonely tunnel
Room.Description: Something indescribable makes you feel lonesome and sad here. The very walls of the tunnel seems to groan. to the north the tunnel bends and east is an intersection.

Room.Name: Intersection
Room.Description: To the north you enter the burial grounds. a trail of blood leads that direction. Also you feel an ominous sense of evil magic from there. The tunnel to the west creaks and sighs as if alive. To the south you smell a hint of fresh air.

Room.Name: Tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel heads north and south. North you see an intersection and far to the south you sense light and smell a fresh breeze.

Room.Name: Tunnel
Room.Description: The tunnel slopes noticeably down to the north and you sense the surface could be reached to the south.

Room.Name: Southern entrance to the catacombs
Room.Description: Through a trapdoor above you streams light. Through a doorway to the south streams darkness. A message has been scrawled upon the wall here. The message reads: Adventure for the strong yet calculating Death for the weak and shallow Treasure for the smart and lucky Death for the stupid and accursed An ancient Glyph above the entrance keeps monsters from wandering up from the catacombs.

Room.Name: Unknown passage
Room.Description: Oh dear you seem to have lost your way. You look back from whence you came but there's no exit there anymore. There are exits in other directions but you have a feeling that you are hopelessly lost.

Room.Name: Unknown passage
Room.Description: Oh dear you seem to have lost your way. You look back from whence you came but there's no exit there anymore. There are exits in other directions but you have a feeling that you are hopelessly lost.

Room.Name: Unknown passage
Room.Description: Oh dear you seem to have lost your way. You look back from whence you came but there's no exit there anymore. There are exits in other directions but you have a feeling that you are hopelessly lost.

Room.Name: Unknown passage
Room.Description: Oh dear you seem to have lost your way. You look back from whence you came but there's no exit there anymore. There are exits in other directions but you have a feeling that you are hopelessly lost.

NPC.name: bat
NPC.description: Your typical smelly, blind flying mammal.
NPC.longDescription: A bat flaps wildly at you!

NPC.name: page templar
NPC.description: He has lost his family and everything of his former life.
NPC.longDescription: A templar page in training is here looking mildly confused.

NPC.name: spelunker explorer
NPC.description: He recently discovered these catacombs and wants to see where they lead. He just hopes he doesn't get killed in the process. He carries only essential exploration gear; if there IS anything down here, he probably won't last long.
NPC.longDescription: A spelunker knows his way around these tunnels.

NPC.name: gravedigger digger robber graverobber
NPC.description: Working for an evil necromancer isn't the greatest thing in the world. They seem like little more than zombie servants themselves.

NPC.name: mist swirling
NPC.description: In fact it IS alive in a magical sort of sense.
NPC.longDescription: Some mist swirls about you here ... it seems ALIVE!

NPC.name: skeleton skeletal soldier
NPC.description: Even though he has died in the physical sense of the word, the battle continues for him in his charmed state.
NPC.longDescription: A skeletal soldier fights in the battle of the underworld.

NPC.name: templar
NPC.description: As you peer closely he peers back at you A templar peers closely at you. A templar tells you, "You are an evil force trying to spread your ways!". A templar tells you, "You must die for your sin!".
NPC.longDescription: A templar shouts "AKK! SLAY THE INFIDEL!"

NPC.name: wraith
NPC.description: Hard to tell much about the mysterious form even upon further inspection.
NPC.longDescription: A mysterious ghostly wraith forms before your eyes.

NPC.name: officer templar
NPC.description: A templar officer tells you "Better move along evil one!"
NPC.longDescription: A templar officer keeps an eye on things here.

NPC.name: zombie mage
NPC.description: He seems to lack real interest in what he is doing.
NPC.longDescription: A blank-faced zombie mage joins the battle.

NPC.name: bat vampire
NPC.longDescription: A bat flaps wildly at you!

NPC.name: necromancer necro cleric
NPC.description: Though he seems absorbed in his work, you'd bet he'd take the time out to kill you to get a fresh corpse!
NPC.longDescription: The evil necromancer makes undead soldiers from corpses.

NPC.name: grand templar leader
NPC.description: A slight, tolerant smile comes briefly across his face. In the blink of an eye he seems stern again.
NPC.longDescription: The grand templar stands here quietly observing your actions

NPC.name: prism dragon prismdragon
NPC.description: The spray of colored light bouncing off his scales is almost blinding.
NPC.longDescription: The light shines off a beautiful but dangerous dragon lurking here.

NPC.name: darken dark beast darkenbeast
NPC.description: You see nothing more than the sense of darkness and evil.
NPC.longDescription: You hear and smell the presence of the darkenbeast.

Item.Name: glowing key
Item.LongDescription: A circular, glowing key radiates a bright aura around it.

Item.Name: granite plate mail platemail
Item.LongDescription: A suit of platemail hewn from granite stands by itself in the corner.

Item.Name: onyx ring
Item.LongDescription: A ring with a very dark onyx stone in it has been left in the dirt.

Item.Name: neutralizer sword
Item.LongDescription: A long thin sword with a wide blade makes you wonder.

Item.Name: sword excalibur
Item.LongDescription: A sword gleams by the light of its magical silvery blade.

Item.Name: crown
Item.LongDescription: The crown of a long lost King lies forgotten here.

Item.Name: stone
Item.LongDescription: The stone is surrounded by a bright glow, better look closer.

Item.Name: holy water flask
Item.LongDescription: A flask of holy water is here.

Item.Name: chainmail chain mail suit
Item.LongDescription: A nice suit of chainmail has been left behind.

Item.Name: white cape
Item.LongDescription: A blazing cape of white lies in a careful pile.

Item.Name: shield defense
Item.LongDescription: A large shield lies protecting the ground.

Item.Name: scale shield dragonscale
Item.LongDescription: A shield from from the scales of a large dragon lies here.

Item.Name: prism wand
Item.LongDescription: A wand made of a triangular prism twinkles in the dust.

Item.Name: shadow cloak
Item.LongDescription: The shadows in the corner of the room seems strange ...

Item.Name: misty potion
Item.LongDescription: A potion of swirling mist-like substance is here.

Item.Name: templar templars sword wooden
Item.LongDescription: A sword made of wood has been left here.
